PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-13152011-11-17EC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Off-Road Compression-Ignition Engine Emission Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the OFF-ROAD COMPRESSION-IGNITION ENGINE EMISSION REGULATIONS, in order to further reduce emissions from off-road diesel engines in Canada by establishing more stringent Canadian off-road diesel emission standards. The proposed amendments would align Canadian emission standards with those of the United States Environmental Protection Agency.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0261 Publication Date: 2011-12-07
AttachmentsAttachment
